content: KCCM-WF Kwik Cast Connect (multi-thread) cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance push-to-connect, cast-in-place anchor with multi-thread for concrete on wood formwork with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Optimized for productivity – quick push-to-connect system offers faster installation speed compared with internally threaded cast-in anchors 2-in-1 connection – multi-thread configuration offers two rod diameter options in one anchoring point for greater flexibility Less re-work – nails prevent head pop-offs before concrete is poured, and perforated foam protects inner threads from concrete intrusion Compatible accessories – combine with KCM-WF-ST stand-up setting tool to complete anchor installation faster in an upright position Codes and approvals – UL and FM approved anchoring solution, covered by an ICC-ES report Applications Ideal for pre-assembled / pre-fabricated hanger assemblies Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Anchor type: Single-point, Cast-in Head configuration: Internally threaded Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Material composition | Carbon steel, Polypropylene | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2363084 - Kwik cast KCCM-WF 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCCM WF Small Cast-in anchor assy - 3950071 - KCCM-WF 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK PALLET + KCM-WF-ST - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1800x KCCM WF Small Cast-in anchor assy - 1x KCM-ST Setting tool assy - 3950070 - KCCM-WF 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1800x KCCM WF Small Cast-in anchor assy - 2363087 - Kwik cast KCCM-WF 3/8,1/2 ORG-YEL - Package Size 75 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCCM WF Medium Cast-in anchor assy - 3950137 - KCCM-WF 3/8,1/2 ORG-YEL PALLET + KCM-WF-ST - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1350x KCCM WF Medium Cast-in anchor assy - 1x KCM-ST Setting tool assy - 3950136 - KCCM-WF 3/8,1/2 ORG-YELPALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1350x KCCM WF Medium Cast-in anchor assy
